wikipedia_page.main: Jack Rea (born 8 August 1990) is an English professional wrestler. He is currently signed to WWE, where he performs on the NXT brand under the ring name Zack Gibson. He is also known for his work on the UK independent circuit. He formed the tag team Grizzled Young Veterans with James Drake in 2017, becoming the inaugural NXT UK Tag Team Champions and three-time Progress Tag Team Champions.

response: |Defeated Grizzled Young Veterans (James Drake and Zack Gibson) in the tournament final at NXT TakeOver: Vengeance Day to win.
*Zack Gibson - WWE wrestler grew up in Maghull and attended Deyes High School
